00014 """
00015 This program will load and run one of the individual demos in this
00016 directory within its own frame window.  Just specify the module name
00017 on the command line.
00018 """
00019 
00020 import wx
00021 import wx.lib.mixins.inspection
00022 import sys, os
00023 
00024 # stuff for debugging
00025 print "wx.version:", wx.version()
00026 print "pid:", os.getpid()

00029 assertMode = wx.PYAPP_ASSERT_DIALOG
00030 ##assertMode = wx.PYAPP_ASSERT_EXCEPTION

00035 class Log:
00036     def WriteText(self, text):
00037         if text[-1:] == '\n':
00038             text = text[:-1]
00039         wx.LogMessage(text)
00040     write = WriteText
00041 
00042 
00043 class RunDemoApp(wx.App, wx.lib.mixins.inspection.InspectionMixin):
00044     def __init__(self, name, module, useShell):
00045         self.namename = name
00046         self.demoModuledemoModule = module
00047         self.useShelluseShell = useShell
00048         wx.App.__init__(self, redirect=False)
00049 
00050 
00051     def OnInit(self):
00052         wx.Log_SetActiveTarget(wx.LogStderr())
00053 
00054         self.SetAssertMode(assertMode)
00055         self.Init()  # InspectionMixin
00056 
00057         frame = wx.Frame(None, -1, "RunDemo: " + self.namename, pos=(50,50), size=(200,100),
00058                         style=wx.DEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE, name="run a sample")
00059         frame.CreateStatusBar()
00060 
00061         menuBar = wx.MenuBar()
00062         menu = wx.Menu()
00063         item = menu.Append(-1, "E&xit\tCtrl-Q", "Exit demo")
00064         self.Bind(wx.EVT_MENU, self.OnExitAppOnExitApp, item)
00065         menuBar.Append(menu, "&File")
00066 
00067         ns = {}
00068         ns['wx'] = wx
00069         ns['app'] = self
00070         ns['module'] = self.demoModuledemoModule
00071         ns['frame'] = frame
00072         
00073         frame.SetMenuBar(menuBar)
00074         frame.Show(True)
00075         frame.Bind(wx.EVT_CLOSE, self.OnCloseFrameOnCloseFrame)
00076 
00077         win = self.demoModuledemoModule.runTest(frame, frame, Log())
00078 
00079         # a window will be returned if the demo does not create
00080         # its own top-level window
00081         if win:
00082             # so set the frame to a good size for showing stuff
00083             frame.SetSize((640, 480))
00084             win.SetFocus()
00085             self.windowwindow = win
00086             ns['win'] = win
00087             frect = frame.GetRect()
00088 
00089         else:
00090             # It was probably a dialog or something that is already
00091             # gone, so we're done.
00092             frame.Destroy()
00093             return True
00094 
00095         self.SetTopWindow(frame)
00096         self.frame = frame
00097         #wx.Log_SetActiveTarget(wx.LogStderr())
00098         #wx.Log_SetTraceMask(wx.TraceMessages)
00099 
00100         if self.useShelluseShell:
00101             # Make a PyShell window, and position it below our test window
00102             from wx import py
00103             shell = py.shell.ShellFrame(None, locals=ns)
00104             frect.OffsetXY(0, frect.height)
00105             frect.height = 400
00106             shell.SetRect(frect)
00107             shell.Show()
00108 
00109             # Hook the close event of the test window so that we close
00110             # the shell at the same time
00111             def CloseShell(evt):
00112                 if shell:
00113                     shell.Close()
00114                 evt.Skip()
00115             frame.Bind(wx.EVT_CLOSE, CloseShell)
00116                     
00117         return True
00118 
00119 
00120     def OnExitApp(self, evt):
00121         self.frame.Close(True)
00122 
00123 
00124     def OnCloseFrame(self, evt):
00125         if hasattr(self, "window") and hasattr(self.windowwindow, "ShutdownDemo"):
00126             self.windowwindow.ShutdownDemo()
00127         evt.Skip()
00128

00133 def main(argv):
00134     useShell = False
00135     for x in range(len(sys.argv)):
00136         if sys.argv[x] in ['--shell', '-shell', '-s']:
00137             useShell = True
00138             del sys.argv[x]
00139             break
00140             
00141     if len(argv) < 2:
00142         print "Please specify a demo module name on the command-line"
00143         raise SystemExit
00144 
00145     name, ext  = os.path.splitext(argv[1])
00146     module = __import__(name)
00147 
00148 
00149     app = RunDemoApp(name, module, useShell)
00150     app.MainLoop()
00151 
00152 
00153 
00154 if __name__ == "__main__":
00155     main(sys.argv)
